full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,GZA' GNANG BRTAGS BSTUNG SOGS KYI MAN NGAG SHIN TU ZAB PA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @009A *, ,ZHES PA 'DI NI BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DAM PA LUNG RTOGS KYI YON TAN DU MAS PHYUG PA'I CHOS RJE RTA BLA MA DAM CHOS RAB RGYAS PAS, BE SNGON NA YOD PA 'DOR RIM CUNG ZAD MI BDE BZHIG BGYI ZHES GSUNGS GIS BSKUL BAR BRTEN NAS, SH'AKYA'I BTZUN PA BLO BZANG BSTAN 'DZIN KYIS BE SNGON NAS 'BYUNG BA'I SNYEN DU 'DOR RIM CUNG ZAD BSNANG TE 'DON BDE BAR SBYAR BA'I YI GE PA NI DPYOD LDAN GU SHR'I DGE SLONG BLO BZANG TSUL KHRIMS SO, ,'DIS KYANG 'GRO BA MANG PO LA PHAN PAR GYUR CIG , ,,MANGGA LAm, ,DGE'O, ,
